title: Korean Style Popcorn Planted Nuggets
instructions: Cook the planted.nuggets according to package instructions until extra crispy and golden.
Prepare the Korean sauce by whisking together gochujang, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and minced garlic.
Heat the sauce in a pan until it bubbles and thickens slightly.
Toss the hot crispy nuggets in the Korean sauce until evenly coated.
Sprinkle generously with toasted sesame seeds and thinly sliced spring onions.
Serve immediately as an appetizer or with steamed rice and pickled vegetables.
